folder.p: Posterior objects, poster, are used to evaluate the behaviour of the posterior dsitribution, and to draw model parameters from the posterior distibution.

Posterior objects are set up within the model/estimate function and returned as the second output argument – the set up and initialisation of the posterior object is fully automated in this case. Alternatively, you can set up a posterior object manually, by setting all its properties appropriately.

ul.li: arwm – Adaptive random-walk Metropolis posterior simulator.
eval – Evaluate posterior density at specified points.
testpar – Test performance of for versus parfor loops in evaluating posterior simulator.
stats – Evaluate selected statistics of an MCMC chain.
